name: Health Potion
effect: Recover I restores 30 health over 5 seconds, Recover II restores 75 health over 5 seconds
description: A basic healing potion that restores health over time.

name: Damage Potion
description: Temporarily increases damage output.

name: Miner Potion
description: Boosts mining efficiency for extended periods.

name: Speed Potion
description: Temporarily increases movement speed.

name: Luck Potion
effect: +20% Luck for 300 seconds, raising the odds of rare drops while farming
description: Increases luck for finding rare items and ores.

name: Luck Totem
effect: Summons a Luck Totem for 5 minutes, increasing Luck by 50%
description: A powerful totem that greatly boosts luck in an area.

name: Warrior Totem
effect: Summons a Warrior Totem that strongly boosts damage for about 5 minutes
description: A combat totem that enhances damage output.

name: Vitality Totem
effect: Summons a Vitality Totem that steadily regenerates health for around 5 minutes
description: A healing totem that provides sustained health regeneration.

name: XP Totem
effect: Summons an XP Totem for 5 minutes that increases XP gain by 100%
description: Doubles experience earned while active.

name: Miner Totem
effect: Summons a Miner Totem for 5 minutes, granting 20% faster mining and 15% extra mining damage
description: A mining totem that boosts mining speed and damage.

name: Tiny Essence
description: A faint remnant of a creature's life force. Used to slightly empower low-tier gear and early weapons.

name: Small Essence
description: A modest fragment of raw spirit, harvested from lesser foes. Entry-level upgrade fuel for beginner and mid-range builds.

name: Medium Essence
description: A solid core of condensed vitality from stronger creatures. Ideal for mid-tier upgrades and step-up gear.

name: Greater Essence
description: A refined and potent concentration of life force from powerful adversaries. Essential for advanced enhancements and late-game weapons.

name: Epic Essence
description: An extraordinary crystal of swirling energy, fused with the memories of countless fallen enemies. Cornerstone of high-end upgrades and signature builds.

name: Superior Essence
description: A gleaming reservoir of pure essence from the mightiest foes. Used for top-tier upgrades and unlocking additional rune slots on endgame gear.

name: Portal Tool
description: Summons a shimmering fast-travel portal that warps you directly to other islands. Unlocked after completing all of Sensei Moro's quests and reaching Level 10.

name: Unknown Key
description: A mysterious, unmarked key. Its lock has yet to be discovered, but it clearly belongs to a hidden mechanism somewhere in the first world.

name: Demonite Key
description: Summoned by the demon Skal in the Volcanic Depths, this key is bound to a specific lock within the Volcanic Depths.

name: Simple Lantern
description: A crucial early-game lantern that permanently unlocks cave visibility. Once purchased, it auto-activates whenever you enter a cave, turning pitch-black tunnels into warm candlelight.
